features: Heated Toilet Seat - Treat yourself to the ultimate in comfort with the WLJBIDET heated bidet toilet seat. With 4 adjustable heating levels from room temperature to 102℉, say goodbye to cold seats and enjoy a soothing experience every time, even on cold mornings.

Multiple Cleaning Modes - Enhance your bathroom experience with the WLJBIDET Modern Luxury Bidet Toilet Seat. Enjoy a refreshing and hygienic clean with unlimited bidet warm water, multiple cleaning modes and a self-cleaning nozzle. Choose from rear wash, female wash, oscillating wash, assisted defecation, automatic and child modes for a personalised bidet experience.

Warm Air Drying - Say goodbye to wasted toilet paper with the warm air drying system. The bidet seat's efficient air dryer provides a hygienic and hands-free drying experience with 4 temperature settings for added comfort.

LED Night Light - The WLJBIDET electric bidet toilet seat is equipped with LED night lights, making midnight bathroom visits safer and more convenient. Add a touch of luxury to your bathroom and impress your guests with this feature. The soft close toilet lid design ensures that never popping noise again every time you close it.

And don't forget about our 24-hour customer service - we're here to help with any questions you may have about installation, operation or hardware accessories. Contact us by email. Upgrade your bathroom experience now with WLJBIDET!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: WLJBIDET is a professional bidet toilet seat manufacture. We focus on designing and developing high-tech intelligent toilet seat. Our mission is to deliver advanced and innovative technology to improve cleanliness and provide a better personal comfort experience. The toilet seat is easy to install and available for elongated toilets. With the WLJBIDET toilet seat, there’s finally a bidet seat that combines warm water wash, heated seat, warm air dryer, adjustable spray, multiple cleaning modes, remote control or panel control, LED night light and more practical features into one toilet. Each time you use WLJBIDET toilet seat, you'll feel more refreshed and energized.

Warm Air Drying System The dryer temperature levels is adjustable up to 4 levels. Choose to keep it warmer or cooler then enjoy the ease and comfort of drying. It also help to reduce the need for toilet paper. Adjustable Heated Seat The 4-level adjustable temperature heated seat provides gentle, soothing warmth for the ultimate comfort, making your bathroom visits a more enjoyable experience. LED night light System Soft blue LED night light help you find the toilet seat without turning on the bathroom light when you wake up in the middle of the night. If you prefer not to use this function, you can simply turn it off. Rotary Button Turning the knob anti-clockwiseactivates the hip wash function, turningit clockwise activates the feminine washfunction, pressing the knob stops theprogramme in progress when washingor drying.

Remove the original toilet seat and fixing fittings and clean the bolt holes and toilet bowl of stains.Press the rubber expansion screws firmly into the toilet bolt holes. Align the fixing plate and metal adjustment sheets with the bolt holes. Then, tighten the screws.

If the bidet toilet seat is longer (or shorter) than the front of your toilet, go back to step 2 and loosen the screws to move the fixing plate closer to (away from) the toilet tank. Tighten the screws and reinstall the bidet toilet seat. Repeat this step until the bidet toilet seat aligns with the front of your toilet.Close the water supply valve and drain the toilet water tank.To avoid getting your floors or shoes wet from residual water, place a basin, rag, or mop under the toilet tank.Insert the black rubber ring into the 3-way valve and screw it on the inlet of the toilet tank. (Avoid using raw material tape or waterproof tape on the inlet as it may prevent the rubber ring from sealing the gap and cause water leakage.)Connect the smaller end of the three-way valve to the DMT pipe. (The DMT pipe was connected to the three-way valve.)Secure the other end of the DMT pipe to the inlet hole of the bidet toilet seat using the retaining clasp (blue semi-circular loop).Turn on the water supply valve to fill the bidet toilet seat with water. Wait for 3-5 minutes. Please check all connections for leaks while waiting.Insertion of the plug. (Ensure the bidet toilet seat has been filled with water for 3-5 minutes before this step, otherwise the LED blue night light from blinking.)

reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Too strong and lid doesn't stay open
reviews.reviewText: This thing was spraying out the cracks under the seat. It doesn't just wash your desired area but rather your entire but. The lid also doesn't like to stay open. Because of how far back on the toilet the Seat goes.This is my 2nd bidet and it does not live up to my previous experiences. Returning.

reviews.reviewText: Very easy to install. Just follow video instructions

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not what I expected!
reviews.reviewText: I was first introduced to a heated toilet seat with a bidet by a person I did some work for.I immediately fell in love with the heated seat Function and how nice it was. I have a bathroom that gets very cold in the winter so I was definitely excited to order this and not have a block of ice to sit on when using the bathroom. The seat arrived a day earlier and the instructions were a bit difficult to understand but my husband managed to figure it out and install it in a decent amount of time. The seat looks nice but once you touch the seat it makes a beeping noise and then the water starts to run from the rear bidet when. It wasn’t even selected. The heat setting is turned up to the max and doesn’t seem to evenly heat the seat. The bidet will randomly turn on for no reason then shuts off. I think the sensor is messed up or something but for the price of this seat I was expecting it to work Flawlessly and not to have an automatic water fountain in my toilet. I am not completely satisfied with this purchase and I will be purchasing a better brand one in the near future such as a Kohler just like the one the person I did work for had.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars You get what you pay for.
reviews.reviewText: EDIT***************************************************************************************************I'm editing the review because my solution solved a ton of issues I was initially experiencing, and after that the machine is working beautifully.IF your machine has the toilet light strobing, super loud (crackling sounding) beeps and the water heating or cleaning functions are not working: Un plug the machine for 30 seconds and plug it back in. Repeat this 4 -5 times as the first few hard resets did not solve my issue. Most of my initial complaints were solved by this fix as the water now heats, the spray oscillates, the toilet light doesn't strobe, the machine appears to clean itself, and the beeps have returned to a normal volume. I'm still taking off one star for the toilet connector as the metal one they provide will not make a complete seal and the metal blades could damage the soft plastic pipe threads behind your US toilet ( as it did to mine). Overall, the machine is a pretty good value for what it provides when all of the functions are working properly.OLD REVIEW*********************************************************************************************************I own a toto washlet and I bought this for a second bathroom. While the toto is easily twice the price it is also twice the machine. For starters, the metal adapter that shipped with the unit will tear up the plastic water connectors behind your US toilet and it wont make a complete seal. I ended up having to purchase another adapter off amazon and you probably will have to do that as well.Grievances: - The unit has an unpleasing beep that can't be shut off and beeps every time you lift the lid. - the water jet comes out ice cold before heating up. - the spray jet is a one trick pony that doesn't oscillate. You can move it back and forth by pushing the buttons constantly but you have to endure the beeps. - the toilet mounting system is inferior and not as secure as more expensive units. - the toilet bowl light is more obnoxious than useful. - the unit doesn't seem to clean the water jet even though it states otherwise.Likes: - the cold jet of water will wake you right up early in the morning.Honestly, just spend the extra money on a toto washlet. With that you will get user profiles, oscillating functions, instant warm water, a better mounting solution, beeps that don't drive you crazy, a nozzle that actually cleans itself a few times a day, a slow closing toilet lid, and a vastly superior Japanese build quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Never knew what I was missing
reviews.reviewText: This is a great bidet at this price point. I haven't seen any others that offer the features of this bidet. Like oscillating spray, self cleaning and most important, bum drying. Has 4 levels of temperature for water and drying. You can also control the water pressure and adjust the position of the water nozzle to hit you in just the right spot. It has a nice display so you know if the temperature of the water is where you want it. The night light feature is nice but you have to turn it on and off manually. Installation was very easy and straight forward, the power cord is a little short and I had to add a power strip to reach the outlet. I'll be buying another one for my other toilet. It has auto and manual modes for cleaning, I prefer the manual mode so I can make sure my bum is clean and dry. The automatic mode has set times for cleaning and drying. The heated seat will be nice on those cold nights.
